Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy has completely redrawn things with his vision and his identity for Wales.
Bellamy has a different training schedule and press conference format compared to previous managers.
Bellamy is focused on creating a high-pressing, hardworking side with a specific identity.
Aaron Ramsey will play a key role as a playmaker when fit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales have a new squad with additions like Charlie Crew due to injuries to other players.
The team is preparing for a high-pressing style of play as per Bellamy's ethos.
